msg: PR50376 clarify that <Directory> applies to the files under the Directory, not just the directories themselves.

author: coheigea
msg: [WSS-255] - Add support for enforcing a Username Token password type
- This can be done by setting WSHandlerConstants.PASSWORD_TYPE_STRICT to "true. - The default value is false.

msg: New replicator: avoid unreleased file handles after compaction of a local endpoint (backport of COUCHDB-926 related fixes).
